185936124.review:
Making Hero Tier 0 while giving it to everyone that plays the game was the worst decision. They really need to change the skill. It just makes no sense. You discard 1 card and can get 
A.) A 4000 Beat stick (Rainbow Dragon)
B.) A Lightning Vortex + 3000 Beat stick (AD Lv.10)
C.) A Discard and pop Quick Effect with battle protection
And that is just for clicking a button, with the worst thing being they just get a free super poly and poly ON TOP. So much free card advantage for nothing makes ranked unbearable. 9 out of every 10 matches are Hero players and why would you play anything else when this skill is so much better than everything else in the game. I really hope they fix this.

185570699.review:
暇人にお勧め！やって後悔！妥協で続けてる！
はっきり言ってゴミです。おすすめはできない。

良い点
配布が多い
良いカードやジェムはイベント毎に大量に配布されるため、スタートダッシュやカード集めはしやすい。

悪い点
課金ゲー
差をつけるなら金だよね！課金でしかゲットできないバカカードはおかしいぜ！あと、カード錬金の機能がないため、欲しいカードがあるなら、パックから出るまで引くか、チケットや交換で手に入れるしかないが、後者はたまに配布されるか、パックの更新を待つしかないため、実用性がない。はっきり言ってバカ

じゃんけんぽん
文字通り。先行が有利です。このゲームは基本2ターンまでに活路を出さないと負けます。１ターンでいかにして活化のゲームです。

面白みのないデュエル・量産デッキ
ランクマはカードゲームあるあるのテンポが悪くてイライラするが基本です。その中で、通信が悪い世界中の人と対戦したら、自分からサレンダーする方がおすすめです。時間の無駄ですから。
また、揃えやすい、強い、高火力のブルーアイズか、最近配布された、全社の三つを揃えたHEROデッキしか見ません。体感八割かな。
他のデッキを使おうにも、集めるには相当気力が必要なため、ほとんどの人は似たデッキになります。
おもしろいか？お？お？

総合
実績がなかったら一週間で飽きてやりません。はやくレアカードゲットして、このばかげたゲームをやめたいな。

185421380.review:
This game was only fun when it was gen 1 and they didn't reintroduce all of the terrible mistakes they made with the series when they started making garbage cards. The main good thing I can say about this is that its beautiful and the most functional and yugioh game system ever created.

Now on to my real current opinion:

Yubel is terrible. Neos is terrible. Named sets are terrible. You simply cant play this game anymore and have fun competitively.

Forget what anyone says about the syncro/pendulum/xyz stuff ruined yugioh. Its the stupid gimmick sets. 

"Oh im gonna make a deck that doesnt allow you to do anything and completely erases your whole field.", "Oh you cant attack and my monsters cant be destroyed and i cant take damage." <-way to make the game feel disgusting to play.

If you want to play this game and having fun playing what you really want, which is the offline anime content, for sure its rad, but you go online and its the most disgusting meta garbage. Apparently their card developers didnt ever get fired during the 2010's and some j-off decided it would be good to make almost every other card limited to only interacting with its own name set and then add all of these ridiculous stupid abilities to the dumbest cards then feel free to ruin what could have been a way better franchise/game.

And if you run those horrible sets that do this go find a hole.

185352923.review:
🎴 Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

💡 Nostalgia e Estratégia:
Se você assistia ao anime Yu-Gi-Oh! na tv globinho ou outra emissora, jogar Duel Links é como reviver aqueles episódios que a batalhava durava 5 episódios, porém, de uma maneira bem mais rápida rs!  A variedade de cartas e possibilidades de decks é praticamente infinita, garantindo que cada jogador encontre seu estilo, ou então, copiar o deck do seu personagem preferido. Mesmo para quem não conhece a saga, o jogo é uma excelente introdução ao mundo de estratégia e cartas.

🛠️ Atualizações:
A Konami faz um ótimo trabalho mantendo o jogo fresco com atualizações regulares e eventos. Isso impede que o jogo fique repetitivo e sempre há algo novo para explorar ou tarefas para concluir, como campanhas temáticas e novos personagens.

📱 Versão Mobile:
As partidas são rápidas e perfeitas para jogar em qualquer lugar quando se trata do jogo em versão mobile/portátil. A progressão é bem satisfatória, com recompensas constantes que motivam o jogador, mesmo com pouco tempo de jogo diário, ou seja, você não precisa gridar o jogo por horas e horas para sentir que seu deck está bom.

💰 Free-to-Play Amigável:
Embora tenha um sistema de compras in-game, Duel Links oferece muitas formas de progredir sem gastar um centavo. Eventos, missões e tarefas diárias dão recursos suficientes para aproveitar o melhor do jogo, uma vez que o pareamento do jogo é decente, evitando que você caia contra viciados.

🎮 Conclusão:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links é um jogo imperdível para fãs da série e amantes de card games. Com nostalgia, estratégia e acessibilidade, ele entrega horas de diversão.

185333941.review:
Main Points:
*It uses the speed duel format, a slimmed down, simpler and faster way of playing the original game
*You pick characters with skills that change up your play-style (generally leans into the deck you've made)
*A lot of insane cards are not in this game and some are heavily limited
*There is plenty of PvE stuff to do and PvP duels are extremely quick to find matches for
*There are only a very small amount of cards you can ONLY get from paying real money, most can be obtained with gems which you get by playing the game

If you enjoy the original card game, I'd say you should give this a go. I didn't like the speed duel format at first, and I didn't even know it was an official format. But it's genuinely fun building slimmer decks with a certain strats in mind. However, there are still one turn knockout decks which you will encounter every now and then. There are ways to deal with them but of course, you will have to just be lucky with your draw. The game is also cross-platform, meaning your progress on PC and mobile are shared (if you set it up on the Konami website) so it's also a nice game to have on the go. Oh, and I would recommend finding a type of deck/theme you want to go for, look up some decks others use (can be done in-game) and then building it up over time with similar cards. It can be really enjoyable making your own version of a type of deck

Eu quase nunca faço alguma análise de jogos, prefiro fazer isso numa roda de amigos ou numa mesa de bar e tentar trazer a galera pra um vício momentâneo. Enfim, eu não tenho problemas com o jogo, meu real problema é com essa empresa que é a Konami, eu simplesmente perdi minha conta por motivos fúteis e não consigo recuperar a conta, é um burocracia imensa e chega a ser frustante ter tantas horas de jogo e um dinheiro desperdiçados em algo que é tão mal gerenciado, creio que essa seja minha única experiência em perder conta onde a empresa responsável não está desligando o servidor ou alguém do meu clã no Ragnarok na época do Teamspeak3 me passou pra trás (especifico demais).
90% do meu tempo jogando foi no busão, entre idas e vindas da faculdade/trabalho, raras as vezes eu joguei aqui na steam e é hoje que eu cravo que a nota é a pior possível. Não pela gameplay ou gráficos, tão pouco a comunidade, é somente e simplesmente por conta da empresa.
Dito isso, prefiro perder tempo com um gatcha, pelo menos eu sei que não vou ter essa dor de cabeça com recuperação de conta.

185097120.review:
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links — это мобильная карточная игра, основанная на популярной франшизе Yu-Gi-Oh!, которая успешно переносит элементы классической настольной игры в цифровой формат. Это отличный способ для фанатов франшизы и новичков познакомиться с миром дуэлей, не обладая при этом физическими картами. Я бы хотел разобрать эту игру на плюсы и минусы:

Плюсы:
1. Вариативность
В этой игре можно создать свою "непобедимую" колоду, а также поддерживать её способностью вашего героя, что даёт кучу мыслей для размышления: "А создать ли мне колоду из белых голубоглазых дракончиков? Или может такую же, только по мультяшнее?"
2. Графика
Для мобильной игры — вполне достойно. Мелкие детали на картах, анимации в дуэлях — всё сделано с душой. Это не AAA-графика, но на телефоне выглядит отлично, а на ПК выглядит приемлемо, да и на слабых железах можно с горем пополам играть.
3. PvP с реальными игроками
Хоть в игре и существует кроссплатформинг, но он почти не на что не влияет, максимум более удобный интерфейс даёт на пк.
4. Звук
Музыка подстраивается под битву, каждый из персонажей имеет свою тему.
5. Мероприятия
Когда я только скачивал эту игру, я думал что о ней уже позабыли и никаких апдейтов там нету, но на самом деле обновления проходят довольно часто, как и собственно мероприятия, к примеру на данный момент проходит мероприятие с замком дуэлянтов, вроде было, а вроде и приятно.

Минусы:
1. Система случайных карт
Как бы ты не старался, микротранзакции или ежедневные паки могут не дать тебе нужных карт. Всё ещё остаётся элемент везения. Купил десяток паков — а тебе выпадет то, что уже есть в коллекции. Это раздражает, и порой затягивает тебя в азарт, как в казино.
2. Проблемы с балансом
Порой кажется, что одни колоды просто слишком сильные и доминируют над всеми остальными. Это приводит к тому, что тебе нужно будет следить за метой и менять свою стратегию, чтобы не попасть под эту волну. Не всегда весело, когда тебе приходится «переигрывать» свою колоду под изменения игры.
3. Долгий прогресс
Не буду лукавить, прокачка может быть утомительной, если ты не готов тратить деньги. Без вложений ты будешь продвигаться медленно, а некоторые карты можно получить только через много времени или за деньги. 
4.  Казуал режим 
Этот режим заполнен ботами или какой-то нечестью. Хотелось бы видеть там побольше настоящих людей, но увы ботам режим рад больше
5. Русский язык
Его нет, был, но удалили, а жаль, теперь в игре разбираться труднее.

Итог: 
Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links — это отличный способ проверить свои стратегические навыки в мобильном формате. Игра неплохо передает дух оригинальной серии, но с учётом мобильных ограничений.  Она предлагает большое разнообразие колод, персонажей и стратегий, что делает каждый матч уникальным.

Оценка: 7 XYZ монстров отправляющих меня в лобби из 10

⚠ИМХО⚠ 

Если вы используете колоду, которая давно уже не в мете, или не колоду 🛐Горничных драконов🛐- на высоких рангах вам делать нечего, как бы это стандартно не звучало.

185089693.review: After multiple top 1,000 finishes in Kaiba cup and ~60 KOG titles, I've called it quits to enjoy life outside Yugioh, Overall, it was fun but there are some significant cautions as well, that's why I don't recommend you start playing, unless you are a huge Yugioh fan. if you want top level competitive decks, you will need to grind thousands of hours or spend a few $K. Before I stopped playing, i did a combination of both. One of the reasons I stopped playing, in addition to the grind, is because new boxes are released with broken skills right before main PVP events to generate revenue and require a few hundred $$$ each time. Yes, you can obtain the deck a bit later by grinding, but by that time the deck will be nerfed and you could save the gems for the next event/deck but the game limits how much gems you can save. So, if you are a competitive player, you need to play in other PVP tournaments not sanctioned by Konami to win $$$ and have a top deck for each Kaiba Cup, but I didn't have the time for that and not sure I had the skill either.

185070912.review: Este é, sem dúvida, o melhor jogo de Yu-Gi-Oh! no mercado. O design característico do anime, o vasto mundo repleto de conteúdo, os personagens incríveis, o sistema de duelos dinâmico e atualizado, juntamente com o design dos personagens dos animes e o novo modo Rush Duel, tornam a experiência cada vez mais impressionante. Se você busca algo mais focado no TCG, o Master Duel é uma excelente opção, mas, se preferir uma experiência mais divertida e casual (embora nem tanto, rsrs), o Duel Links é ótimo. O maior ponto negativo do jogo é a imensa quantidade de dinheiro que será necessário investir para sempre ter as cartas meta. Porém, no final das contas, o jogo é excelente.

185066949.review: Phew, took a bit of grinding, but i finally got my first F2P competitive deck ready! :)

184954134.review:
Пишу отзыв не с целью оскорбить вас или игру, а как обращение. Конами, ВЕРНИТЕ РУССКИЙ ЯЗЫК! Эта игра познакомила меня с вселенной Yu-Gi-Oh, и убрав русский язык, вы просто ограничили СНГ игроков в ознакомлении с лором,деталями игры, и тд. В реалях трудно найти что-то про данную вселенную в наших странах, а тут еще и удаление русского языка,который убрал барьер в непонимании столь хорошей вселенной и игры. Пожалуйста,верните руссификацию. Внешние конфликты не должны мешать наслаждатся простым игрокам, получающим удовольствие от игры.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I'm writing this review not to insult you or the game, but as an appeal. Konami, bring back the Russian language! This game introduced me to the Yu-Gi-Oh universe, and by removing the Russian language, you just limited the CIS players in familiarizing themselves with the lore, details of the game, and so on. In real life it is difficult to find something about this universe in our countries, and here and remove the Russian language, which removed the barrier to misunderstanding of such a good universe and game. Please, bring back the Russification. External conflicts should not interfere with the enjoyment of ordinary players who enjoy the game.

184710744.review: I reinstalled this recently because I horribly invested my resources in Master Duel and was locked in Gold ranked without a meta deck, and felt incredibly discouraged by the grind. I heard Duel links had slower gameplay and decided to come back only to find actual paywalls on some cards and archetypes, and vagabond duelists who can in a single turn summon Berzerkion which my decks lack the power to tackle. With Speed Duel soon ending in the card game, rush duel being confirmed ocg only, modern yugioh just feels incredibly discouraging. Nothing feels worse than going to your locals for a fun game only to face someone who spent 1k on a deck that lets them consistently summon 4 negates turn 1 AND retain enough hand traps to prevent you from playing at all. (I know this is more a rant against modern yugioh but Duel Links/speed duel is still a format of modern yugioh)

183620873.review: Fui jogador de Duel Links desde o dia que ele foi lançado na playstore, simplesmente foram eras de ouro na época. Totalmente divertido, dinâmico e inovador. Infelizmente tudo se perdeu quando começaram a investir em decks metas, estruturais e etc... tornando o jogo totalmente pay to win, fora sem contar as poucas ''atualizações'' para quem não tinha condições de por dinheiro e queria conquistar novas cartas ou ficar por dentro do meta. Afinal, não tinhamos da onde tirar recursos para a loja, infelizmente abandonei, mas ficará na memória o quão bom foi acompanhar do começo, até meados de 2022.

183611598.review:
Duel Links, In my opinion, is a good Yu Gi Oh game and is miles better than Master Duel for a bunch of reasons: 

1) The game is fast paced. With Speed Duels, you have 3 monster and 4 spell/trap zones instead of the traditional 5 monster and 6 spell and trap zones. Less cards are needed to create a deck meaning instead of making your traditional 40 minimum/60 maximum deck, you have a 20 minimum/30 maximum deck. This means matches are quicker (for the most part, if it isn't PVP) and you will most likely have a better hand given the deck chemistry. Also instead of 8,000 life points, both players start with 4,000 and there is no main phase 2. 

2) It is aesthetically more pleasing than Master Duel. Instead of Master Duel giving certain monsters in certain archetypes a slight GIF summoning animation from their card art, Duel Links actually gives you full 3D model summoning animations of certain Ace monsters for each character (and call outs for specific monsters they use).  The menus are very clean and concise and believe it or not, the card art actually is in higher definition and resolution than it is Master Duel. 

3) The game is F2P friendly. Duel links is more generous with rewards than Master Duel. They both use gems but it's much more abundant here as gems are given out during the launch of card boxes that come out periodically (2 weeks - a Month) [Master duels does not do this. You have to grind it out via PVP or solo mode, it sucks], during events and as level up rewards for each character. You can get mostly get what you want whether it's pre-made decks, cosmetics, specific card bundles or just to roll for more cards in the boxes with either enough time and level grinding.

4) The Meta is closely monitored here by the devs. You will notice the ban list is drastically different here than the current TGC or Master duel (Because Speed duels have less rules and whatnot and cards are released at regular intervals frequently here. I get it, its a complete headache.) Particularly in each update, after a PVP season, the developers actually look into some of the most popular or abused cards online and will either limit or ban cards that flat out break the game with the current Speed duel rules .Some cards are flat out nerfed and some effects are actually omitted at times to keep the game more fair and playable which is concerning if you remember cards differently in the physical or yu gi oh video games (Which to be fair, they should just add a mode where you play with the original effects of monsters/spells/traps.)

5) The game is more character oriented. Typically in master duel, Konami usually encouraged people to "Frankenstein" archetypes together to make really bullsh*t decks that abused special summoning or severely limited players to do things for a means of victory. This game, However, introduces skills for characters. These skills serve as a means of dominating the battlefield or a comeback mechanic if you are in a tight bind. These skills can be acquired through events or achievements and they are pretty good but have restrictions upon use to make it more fair PVP or otherwise (For Example: Every 1.500 LP lost you get to draw a random spell or trap, Gain 1500 life points in the beginning of the duel but start off with one less card, etc). Some skills are more associated with the archetype that characters play while others are more general skills. Thats not to say you are restricted to just playing whatever character archetype because Konami recently made an update where you can get more skills if you play with various archetypes several times. You have the choice of using these skills or not but you have the freedom to play as you see fit. Don't worry, Skills are balanced as well to avoid any abuse or Meta abundancy.

These are all the positive points that I have accumulated over the time I have played this game.

The only real negatives of this are probably just certain cards not being included in the archetypes you love and of course, encountering PVP matches with people using Troll cards/decks (You know the ones. Parasite Paracide, Lava Golem, Needle bug nest, Crackdown, Kiteroid, Man Eating Mimicking Bug, Cyberse, etc). But hey, at least you don't have to wait a thousand years for a dude to play one card, or fill their field, chain by chain. Thankfully, you only have 200 seconds of time instead of the 300 seconds plus bonus time in Master Duel.

Wrapping things up,  If you want a fun, quick match and play a more balanced version of Yu Gi Oh with several twists that has a ton of fan service, events and references to the shows/manga, pick it up and give it a try. As a Veteran Yu Gi Oh fan, you'll be pleased.
